headline: HealthLynked Partners with Endlink to Accelerate EMR and Hospital System Integration
summary: Strategic collaboration expands HealthLynked's focus on interoperability and digital transformation in hospital systems and EMRsNAPLES, Fla., June 25, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- via IBN -- HealthLynked Corp. (OTCQB: HLYK), a pioneer in healthcare technology and patient engagement, today announced a strategic partnership with Endlink, a healthcare data integration firm led by industry veteran Rubén Viera.
